name: Relic Coffret: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
description: A device used to collect and restore the Lightdust in the Fragmentum to its original form. Use this to obtain a random 5-star relic from the Wastelander of Banditry Desert set.
story:
You never know what's in the box until you open it.

"So it's essentially like buying a lottery ticket?"
"At least we don't need to worry about finding a cat that is both dead and alive."
